kpi.name: M1001C112

kpi_info.title: RAB SETUP FAILURES DUE TO RNC FOR PS DATA BACKG
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB setup failures caused by RNC for PS data background. UPDATED:When the RNC decides to reject the PS data background RAB request due to RNC internal failure. This happens before the RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP message would be sent to the UE. (See the section "Failure and abnormal release causes" for more details.)

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB SETUP FAILURES DUE TO RNC FOR PS DATA BACKG
